font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 主席台， 嘉宾席： a raised platform, as in a lecture hall, for speakers or honored guests.
【例】 the speaker took his place at the front of the dais 演讲者在主席台就坐
【近】 podium, rostrum, tribune

【记】 desk
